subject: Re: [junit] what is the purpose of TestDecorator
msgSnippet: Hello, First I want to greet to everybody because I am new in this group. I will have to do some automatic tests of an application developed in swt. I have
messageBody:
Hello,

First I want to greet to everybody because I am new in this group.
I will have to do some automatic tests of an application developed in
swt. I have been looking for and I have found the abbot framework.
Initially something that it is not possible to do with abbot is
generate a report after executing the scripts that have been created
with the capture action.
Somebody knows another framework that generates script of tests with
swing and swt applications and show a report of the result?

Thanks and regards,
Juan Carlos.
